page.title: 18Norwell Kids In Drama
page.content: The group was formed in{1983}with the aim of providing local children with an opportunity to experience a wide variety of drama activities including workshop sessions and productions, which have included...... {"Scrooge" 1983,"N is for Norwell" and{"Christmas Is" 1984 }with the forth coming pantomime,{"Jack and the {Beanstalk"}Christmas{1985.}In addition they organise theatre visits to live productions. {"N is for Norwell"}a historical documentary about the village was the basis for a book called{"Memories of {Norwell",}funded by Newark Council. Productions are rehearsed in the school and presented in the village hall. Recently membership has been extended to adults and this has raised numbers to over{30.}The group is affiliated to Norwell Youth Club.
